hero.title: QiSol
hero.subtitle: Advanced Dissolving Wound Healing Film Infused with botanical extract from Quercus infectoria

product.title: QiSol Film
product.description: Unlike conventional wound dressings, QiSol does not need removal, reduces re-injury, affordable and ideal for diabetic & pressure ulcers.

features.title: Key Highlights
items: Accelerates wound healing, promotes new cell growth
Quercus infectoria extract: anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, hemostatic

benefits.title: Why QiSol?
benefits.desc: Advanced dissolving wound healing film infused with botanical extract from Quercus infectoria

metrics.label: Bacteria Protection
metrics.detail: Effectively reduces the risk of bacterial infection

metrics.label: Faster Healing
metrics.detail: Three times faster than traditional methods, greatly reducing recovery time

metrics.label: Cost Reduction
metrics.detail: Cuts treatment and healthcare costs by up to 40%

items.title: Quercus infectoria Extract
items.desc: Rich in flavonoids and phenolic compounds with anti-inflammatory and regenerative effects

content.title: Dissolvable Hydrogel Film
content.desc: Dissolves in wound exudate, no painful removal required

content.title: Quercus infectoria Extract
content.desc: Rich in flavonoids and phenolic compounds with anti-inflammatory and tissue-regenerative properties

content.title: Polyvinyl Alcohol (PVA)
content.desc: Primary material for creating dissolvable hydrogel fibers that dissolve in water

content.title: Quercus infectoria Extract
content.desc: Natural compound with anti-inflammatory properties that aids in tissue repair

research.title: Research & Patent Information
research.description: Advanced research and development using cutting-edge technology to create safe and effective medical innovations

overview.title: Development of Hydrogel Films for Wound Treatment
overview.description: Medical innovation using Electrospinning technology to create thin films that can effectively assist in wound healing

methodology.title: Manufacturing and Testing Process
methodology.description: Using Electrospinning technique combined with Polyvinyl alcohol to create films with special properties

methods.title: Solution Preparation
methods.desc: Mix PVA with additives for optimal properties

methods.title: Performance Evaluation
methods.desc: Real-world testing with various wound types
